lodash._basevalues v3.0.0

The modern build of lodashâ€™s internal baseValues exported as a Node.js/io.js module.

Installation

Using npm:

$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash._basevalues

In Node.js/io.js:

var baseValues = require('lodash._basevalues');

See the package source for more details.
